articles.author: Dominic Hogan
articles.title: North London derby will be on BT on October 1 and Manchester City v Liverpool on Sky on October 16 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The first north London derby of the season will kick off on October 1 at 12.30pm, and Sky customers will see Liverpool and Manchester City face off on October 16 at 4.30pm.
